mapper.select: SELECT t.headimg, t.username, t.realname, ( SELECT t2.role_name FROM wu_role t2 WHERE t2.id = t.roleid ) AS role, t.login_at AS loginAt, ( SELECT t3.ip FROM wu_vistor t3 WHERE LEFT (t3.us, LENGTH(t.id) + 1) = t.id + ':' ORDER BY t3.id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS lastIp, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wu_vistor t4 WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(t4.tm) < 7 ) AS todayNum, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wu_vistor ) AS allNum, NULL AS weekChart FROM wu_user AS t WHERE t.id = #{uid}
